name: Multiflight
about: Multi Engine Flight School, located in Glendale, Arizona, has been a trusted name in flight training for over 35 years. We offer a range of programs, including multi-engine ratings, commercial pilot training, instrument add-ons, and airline transport pilot certifications. Our accelerated 15-hour multi-engine course, priced at $5499.99, covers instructor fees, fuel, ground school, and aircraft for the check ride. With a focus on reliability and safety, our experienced instructors and well-maintained aircraft ensure a high standard of training. We are committed to helping pilots achieve their goals, whether it's for personal flying or a professional career. Contact us today to start your journey to becoming a certified pilot.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
